span.span: Generates a deploy manifest for ClickOnce projects.

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的更新位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the update location for the application.
The update location for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定此属性，则不会为应用程序定义更新位置。If this property is not specified, no update location is defined for the application. 但是，如果 属性为 `true` ，则必须指定更新位置。However, if the property is `true`, an update location must be specified. 指定的值应为完全限定的 URL 或 UNC 路径。The specified value should be a fully qualified URL or UNC path.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示当通过 URL 打开应用程序时是否应该自动运行应用程序。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the application should be run automatically when it is opened through a URL.

value.span: 如果应用程序只能从“开始”**菜单中启动，则为** ；否则为 。

span.span: if the application can only be started from the **Start** menu; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值是 `false`。The default value is `false`. 仅当属性值为时，此属性才适用 `true` 。This property applies only when the property value is `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示应用程序是已安装应用程序还是仅联机应用程序。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean that indicates whether the application is an installed application or an online-only application.

value.span: 如果应用程序将要安装在本地计算机上，并且可以通过“添加或删除程序” **对话框删除，则为** ；如果应用程序用于在网页上的联机使用，则为 。

span.span: if the application is to be installed on the local computer and can be removed by using the **Add or Remove Programs** dialog box; if the application is for online use from a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值是 `true`。The default value is `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示是否使用 .deploy 文件扩展名映射。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the .deploy file name extension mapping is used.

value.span: 如果每个程序文件都是通过 .deploy 文件扩展名发布的，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if every program file is published with a .deploy file name extension; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此选项用于 Web 服务器安全，以限制必须取消阻止的文件扩展名的数量，以启用 ClickOnce 应用程序部署。Use this option for Web server security to limit the number of file name extensions that must be unblocked to enable ClickOnce application deployment. 默认值是 `false`。The default value is `false`.

value.span: 如果用户可跳过更新，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user can skip the update; otherwise, .

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application.
The name of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定此属性，则将从生成的清单的标识中推断该名称。If this property is not specified, the name is inferred from the identity of the generated manifest. 该名称将用作“开始”菜单上的快捷名称，且将作为“添加或删除程序”对话框中显示的名称的一部分 。This name is used for the shortcut name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in the **Add or Remove Programs** dialog box.

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的发布者。

span.span: Gets or sets the publisher of the application.
The publisher of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定此属性，则将从已注册的用户或生成的清单的标识中推断该名称。If this property is not specified, the name is inferred from the registered user, or the identity of the generated manifest. 此名称用于 " **开始** " 菜单上的文件夹名称，并且是 " **卸载或更改程序** " 对话框中显示的名称的一部分。This name is used for the folder name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in the **Uninstall or change a program** dialog box.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示是否应检查更新。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether updates should be checked.

summary.span: 可在应用程序启动前（在前台）、或在应用程序运行时（在后台）检查更新。

span.span: Updates can be checked before the application is started (in the foreground), or when the application is running (in the background).

value.span: 若应检查更新，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if updates should be checked; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以有下列值：This property can have the following values: - `Foreground` 在启动应用程序之前 () `Foreground` (before the application is started) - `Background` 当应用程序运行时 () `Background` (when the application is running) 默认值是 `Background`。The default value is `Background`. 仅当 和属性的值都是时，此属性才适用 `true` 。This property only applies when the values of the and properties are both `true`.
